DatabaseName.Description: The name of the first database to be created when the cluster is created param=DBNAME

SourceClusterSnapshot.Description: The snapshot that should be used to recover the source cluster

NumberOfNodes.Description: The number of compute nodes in the cluster. For multi-node clusters, the NumberOfNodes parameter must be greater than 1

NodeType.Description: The type of node to be provisioned

MasterUsername.Description: The user name that is associated with the master user account for the cluster that is being created param=USERNAME

MasterUserPassword.Description: The password that is associated with the master user account for the cluster that is being created. Stored encrypted via KMS

InboundTrafficForEc2.Description: Allow inbound traffic to the cluster from this CIDR range.
InboundTrafficForEc2.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

SSHKeyForEc2.Description: SSH key used for authentication to EC2 host
SSHKeyForEc2.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 Keypair name.

AMIForEC2.Description: The ami used for the EC2 instance

RedshiftPortNumber.Description: The port number on which the cluster accepts incoming connections. param=PORT

GitHubUrl.Description: GitHub Url of repro to be bootstrapped on Ec2

GitHubBranch.Description: The branch to checkout for the repro to be bootstrapped on Ec2

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for traffic within the stack

Properties.Description: Key created by cloud formation for Unload-Copy-testing, should not be considered well protected

S3CopyRole.Description: Role-arn that will be used for S3 access param=COPY_ROLE
